Table of Contents

Class DynamicCreatorMersenneTwister

Namespace
Vts.MonteCarlo.Rng
Assembly
Vts.dll

This class creates a parallelizable representation of the Mersenne Twister class. Code from Dynamic Creator (dc) Home Page http://www.math.sci.hiroshima-u.ac.jp/~m-mat/MT/DC/dc.html or GitHub: https://github.com/MersenneTwister-Lab/dcmt (same code both places) The code is in C, so this code maintained many of the constructs and coding statements to be able to produce same results

public class DynamicCreatorMersenneTwister : RandomSource

DynamicCreatorMersenneTwister(int, int, uint, uint)

Initializes a new instance of the MersenneTwister class. This version allows the user to specify word length, period exponent, original MT seed and new generator seed

double

A double-precision floating point number greater than or equal to 0.0, and less than 1.0.

public DynamicCreatorMersenneTwister.mt_struct get_mt_parameter(int wordSize, int periodExponent)

Parameters

wordSize int

word size: only w=32 or 31 allowed

periodExponent int

Mersenne exponent: p greater than or equal to 521 and p less than or equal to 44497

Returns
